Package org.tedros.fx.presenter.decorator

Interface ITListViewDecorator<M extends TEntityModelView<? extends org.tedros.server.entity.ITEntity>>

  • Type Parameters:
    M -
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TDetailCrudViewDecorator, TEditModalDecorator, TMasterCrudViewDecorator
    public interface ITListViewDecorator<M extends TEntityModelView<? extends org.tedros.server.entity.ITEntity>>
    The model list view decorator contract.
    Author:
    Davis Gordon
